MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL57 postcode area of Bangor, affecting properties in Ffordd Caernarfon, Cyttir Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:54pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:54pm on 30th January 2021.
